neverConnected.title: Warning
neverConnected.text: No player with this id has already connected to the server. If this is your profile, connect to the server to see your statistics.

steamConnect.title: Connect with steam
steamConnect.text: To view your full profile, see your rankings, statistics, graphs and more...

goProfile.title: Go to your profile
goProfile.text: To view your full profile, see your rankings, statistics, graphs and more...

discordQuest.title: Complete the discord quest
discordQuest.text: To gain XP and help you get through the levels.

helpServer.title: Help the server
helpServer.text: By becoming VIP and unlocking exceptional visuals to set you apart from other players.

vip.title: You are VIP
vip.text: Thank you very much for helping the server ♥. It is thanks to you that the server can continue to exist.

discordModal.error: An error occurred and the quest was not completed. Please try again and contact an administrator if this happens again.
discordModal.success: You have completed the discord quest. Please log out and log back in to the game to see the changes.
discordModal.notMember: You are not a Discord member. Please join the Discord server before proceeding to the verification.
discordModal.title: Discord Quest
discordModal.p1: Join our discord server by clicking on this button
discordModal.p2: When this is done, or if you are already a member, let us verify that you are indeed a member.
discordModal.btnCheck: Check that I am a member
discordModal.info: Permission to see the servers you belong to will be immediately removed once the check is performed.

profileInfo.title: Profile information
profileInfo.isItsProfile: This is your profile. Only you can see the information with a lock
profileInfo.isNotItsProfile: This is not your profile or you are not connected. In order to protect player privacy, you do not have access to all the profile information.

lock: Only you can see this information

resetScore.title: Reset your score
resetScore.info: This feature allows you to reset your points to 1000. The reset will be final. It can be used as many times as desired.
